column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I have been wanting to try this restaurant for awhile now as I had it saved to my collections. The server told us on sundays they have a huge brunch with a Dj that I would love to check out. Our food was good the side dishes of Brussels sprouts and Mac and cheese I would recommend both rich in flavor and the Mac is really creamy. The lettuce wraps were good
column2: burger was full of flavor and juicy
column3: my daughter liked the pasta but felt like the sauce was too overwhelming. Other than that great service great food. Can't wait to try Sunday funday.
